column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I visited with a friend for a fun Friday night dinner
column2: and I was pleasantly surprised by how much I liked it!  We were seated on the patio
column3: which was fun....and the place was packed.  We tasted a variety of dishes
column4: and most of them were quite good.  The goat cheese and the pecan crusted chicken were my personal faves :)  The Sangria is good
column5: and comes in many varieties.  Be sure to order by the pitcher
column6: because it goes quickly!!   The service was fantastic
column7: and the manager (Lindsay) is a doll!  Everything is so affordable
column8: and it is fun to be able to try so many different dishes!  I will definitely be going back!  Great place to go with friends or a date.
